lead_paragraph: Benfica of Lisbon has reached an agreement in principle with M.L.S. to sign the teenage striker Freddy Adu for $2 million, the club said. Benfica said Adu, an 18-year-old forward with Real Salt Lake, had to pass a physical before joining the team.
snippet: Benfica of Lisbon has reached an agreement in principle with M.L.S. to sign the teenage striker Freddy Adu for $2 million, the club said. Benfica said Adu, an 18-year-old forward with Real Salt Lake, had to pass a physical before joining the team.
